citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The last program review completed by the IACUC was in December 2023. This review is required to be completed at
least every six months. This review is needed to ensure the humane use of animals at the facility. Complete this review.
Correct by 11/10/2024

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The last facility inspection completed by the IACUC was in December 2023. This inspection is required to be completed at
least every six months. This inspection is needed to ensure the humane use of animals at the facility. Complete this
inspection.
Correct by 11/10/2024

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The last report to the Institutional Official on the facility inspection and program review was completed in December 2023.
This report is required to be completed at least every six months. This report is essential to keep the Institutional Official
aware of potential issues at the facility. Complete this report.
Correct by 11/10/2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n
